plot: Rodion Romanovitch Raskolnikov, a handsome young student, is hopelessly in debt to his landlady. He is going to see a pawnbroker and is obsessed with not running into anyone on the way. ...
title: Prestuplenie i nakazanie
plot_es: Rodion Romanovitch Raskolnikov, a handsome young student, is hopelessly in debt to his landlady. He is going to see a pawnbroker and is obsessed with not running into anyone on the way. ...
plot_en: Rodion Romanovitch Raskolnikov, a handsome young student, is hopelessly in debt to his landlady. He is going to see a pawnbroker and is obsessed with not running into anyone on the way. ...
